meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed by my first-year Chemistry class and academic expectations
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m John, a first-year majoring in Chemistry. I’ve taken a few courses so far and already feel like I’m in over my head. Some of the readings have been really difficult, and the material is really complex. I’m worried that I’m not doing well enough to pass the class, and I’m starting to panic. I’m also really interested in the chemistry of addiction and how drugs work, but I don’t know if I’m even eligible to take that course or if it’s just too advanced for me. I’m feeling really isolated in my major and worried that everyone else is ahead of me, which is making me even more anxious. I’d love to talk to someone about how to manage my academic and emotional stress, and I’m excited to meet with you about trying something different in my first semester.
